Indigenous Software | San Diego, CA, USA and Remote | Full-time | https://indigenous.io/careers | Full-Stack Node.js/MEAN Developer

Indigenous Software is building a fully integrated SAAS suite making it simple and cost effective for small businesses and entrepreneurs to promote their business, engage their customers and make money. We're funded, live (in Beta) and based in San Diego, with a fully-remote engineering organization.

The Indigenous engineering team comes from Amazon, R/GA, Dell, NASA, Qualcomm and more. We build with Node.js, Mongo, Express and Angular on AWS and Compose.io.

We're looking for full-stack engineers with experience using the above technologies at all skill levels (assuming compensation expectations match experience).

Submit your CV to jobs@indigenous.io to be considered.
